summary: Arne Duncan  is an American education administrator who has been United States Secretary of Education since 2009. Duncan previously served as CEO of the Chicago Public Schools.
full_text: Arne Duncan  is an American education administrator who has been the United States Secretary of Education since 2009. He will step down at the end of 2015. Duncan previously served as superintendent of the Chicago Public Schools district from 2001-2009.
title: Arne Duncan
